channel.title: Football Director on
channel.description: Recent content in Football Director on

item.title: Football Director
item.description:
Commodity trading or should I say people trading? Think you have an eye for smart investments searching for clues on football player’s traits that might lead them to global superstars? Try Football Director, starting with 6 players you can exercise your trading expertise right away letting go the 3 worst players.

Like the real estate business game you’ll have players popping up with their prices growing and decreasing quite fast so be cautious to get the best deals, from here you have a football field where the season will be played and you’re expected to replace the players with the better ones you bough or rotate them to keep’em fitness.
